Class: SSV

ssv.SSV(name)

new SSV(name)

SSV is a class to representing a Simple Spectrum Viewer and generating charts for Vega Components.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name Text

Name of the Simple Spectrum Viewer instance
Source:
  • SSV.js, line 22
See:

getVegaSpec(width, height, minx, maxx, miny, maxy, axis_labels, secondary_traces)

Produce Marz Simple Spectrum View chart. The returned vega schema will have the following signals: templateOffset : Vertically offset the active template redshift : apply redshift to the active template and each of the spectra lines

Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
width integer
height integer
minx Number
maxx Number
miny Number
maxy Number
axis_labels boolean true
secondary_traces boolean true
Source:
  • SSV.js, line 508
Returns:

vega schema as json
